TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlMethods extends System.Object
public ref class SqlMethods abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供与 SQL Server 函数对应的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that correspond to SQL Server functions.

summary.span: 类中的方法仅在 LINQ to SQL 查询中受支持。

span.span: Methods in the class are only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

summary.span: 对两个指定日期之间的日期边界进行计数。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函数使用`day`指定的时间边界类型删除线。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `day` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 有关此 SQL Server 函数的详细信息，请参阅[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

public: static int DateDiffDay(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate);

The end date for the time period.

span.span: The number of day boundaries between the two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函数使用`year`指定的时间边界类型删除线。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `year` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 有关此 SQL Server 函数的详细信息，请参阅[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

span.span: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.

summary.span: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查询支持此方法。

span.span: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server`LIKE`功能无法通过转换的现有公共语言运行时 (CLR) 和.NET Framework 构造公开，不支持在 LINQ to SQL 上下文之外。The SQL Server `LIKE` functionality cannot be exposed through translation of existing common language runtime (CLR) and .NET Framework constructs, and is unsupported outside of a LINQ to SQL context. 使用此方法在 LINQ to SQL 之外始终将引发异常的类型。The use of this method outside of LINQ to SQL will always throw an exception of type .

span.span: The string to be searched for a match.

param.name: escapeCharacter

span.span: The character to put in front of a wildcard character to indicate that it should be interpreted as a regular character and not as a wildcard character.
